abstract: How about me? Or better, Keynes.
snippet: How about me? Or better, Keynes.
lead_paragraph: Sorry, but if I am not for myself, who will be for me? For readers new to this, back in 2010 Business Week ran a story contrasting my pessimistic views with the bullish outlook of hedgie John Paulson, and making it clear that only a fool would believe the views of some bearded professor.

headline.main: Who You Gonna Bet On, October 2011
